decisions.name: ARe_required_Documents_missing_for_ES
decisions.label: ARe required Documents missing for ES?

rules.name: Documents_are_missing_for_ES
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND (9 OR 10 OR 11) AND (12 OR 13) AND 14 AND 15
rules.label: Documents are missing for ES

Flow.description: Subflow to send Email Alerts and related field updates This is being called from Product2: After Created/Updated flow

formulas.name: productCreationAlertCellularFormula
formulas.expression: OR( CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ADP"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "C027"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "C16"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-C"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-G"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-L"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-U"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-R"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "FW27"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "FW75"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "LEON"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "LISA"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "MPCI"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "SARA"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "TOBY") )

formulas.name: productCreationAlertFormulaPOS
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ADP")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "C027")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "C16")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-C")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-G")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-L")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-U")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "FW27")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "FW75")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "LEON")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "LISA")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "MPCI")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "SALA")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "TOBY")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ACC-")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-O")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-R")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-W")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBC")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBI")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBS")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ODIN")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLCI")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLP")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLS")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OWL")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OWS")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "PBS")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "PZC")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "RBE")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "RBS")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "RWE")), NOT(CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "WDK")) )

formulas.name: shoProductNameFormula
formulas.expression: OR( CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "WDK"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "PZC"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "PBS"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OWS"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OWL"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLS"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLP"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OLCI"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBS"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBI"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "OBC"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-W"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EVK-O"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ACC-"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "WB"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "LILY"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "EMMY"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ELLA"), CONTAINS({!Product_Record.Name}, "ODIN") )

Flow.label: Product2: Email Alerts
